ResumeParserData.Experience: Product Manager	,NatWest Bank  Manchester, UK	,2018 - Present  At NatWest Bank, Sophia led the creation and launch of new financial products, significantly boosting customer acquisition. Her role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams to ensure successful product integration and market alignment.  Product Manager	,Santander UK  Manchester, UK	,2015 - 2018  Sophia managed a comprehensive portfolio of financial products, driving a 20% increase in revenue. She utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.  Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society  Manchester, UK	,2012 - 2015  Sophia's role at Nationwide Building Society involved overseeing the entire product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch. Her focus on customer feedback and market trends enabled the creation of products that met evolving customer needs.  Product Manager	,Halifax Bank  Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2012  At Halifax Bank, Sophia directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. Her efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends to refine product offerings.  Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland  Manchester, UK	,2006 - 2009  Sophia oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. She engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts and improve customer satisfaction.  Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank  Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2006  Sophia managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. Her strategic initiatives led to significant business growth and customer retention.  Product Manager	,Barclays Bank  Manchester, UK	,2000 - 2003  Sophia's role at Barclays involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. Her collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.  Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks  Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2000  Sophia gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Sophia Bennett is a seasoned Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the UK banking industry. With a degree in Mathematics from a Russell Group university, she has excelled in leading product development and managing successful launches for top-tier banks. Sophia's expertise in strategic planning, market analysis, and customer satisfaction has consistently driven business growth and product innovation.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Sophia has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Product Manager at NatWest Bank for the last 6.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at NatWest Bank. from 01/01/2018 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 6.7 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Santander UK. from 01/01/2015 to 31/12/2018. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Nationwide Building Society. from 01/01/2012 to 31/12/2015. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Halifax Bank. from 01/01/2009 to 31/12/2012. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Royal Bank of Scotland. from 01/01/2006 to 31/12/2009. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Lloyds Bank. from 01/01/2003 to 31/12/2006. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Sophia holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2000 to 31/12/2003. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.
ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Sophia Bennett
Address : 89 Pine Lane, Manchester, England
Email : sophia.bennett@example.com
Phone : 07876 543210

Personal Statement
Sophia Bennett is a seasoned Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the UK banking industry. With a degree in Mathematics from a Russell Group university, she has excelled in leading product development and managing successful launches for top-tier banks. Sophia's expertise in strategic planning, market analysis, and customer satisfaction has consistently driven business growth and product innovation.

Key Skills Summary
Product Lifecycle Management
Market Research and Analysis
Strategic Product Planning
Cross-functional Team Collaboration
Customer Experience Enhancement
Data Analysis and Interpretation

Education History
University of York (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK	,2018 - Present
At NatWest Bank, Sophia led the creation and launch of new financial products, significantly boosting customer acquisition. Her role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams to ensure successful product integration and market alignment.
Product Manager	,Santander UK
Manchester, UK	,2015 - 2018
Sophia managed a comprehensive portfolio of financial products, driving a 20% increase in revenue. She utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.
Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK	,2012 - 2015
Sophia's role at Nationwide Building Society involved overseeing the entire product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch. Her focus on customer feedback and market trends enabled the creation of products that met evolving customer needs.
Product Manager	,Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK	,2009 - 2012
At Halifax Bank, Sophia directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. Her efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends to refine product offerings.
Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK	,2006 - 2009
Sophia oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. She engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts and improve customer satisfaction.
Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK	,2003 - 2006
Sophia managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. Her strategic initiatives led to significant business growth and customer retention.
Product Manager	,Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK	,2000 - 2003
Sophia's role at Barclays involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. Her collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2000
Sophia gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) 

AMS - Confidential

AMS - Confidential
  of NUMPAGES
ResumeParserData.HtmlResume:
Sophia Bennett

Address: 89 Pine Lane, Manchester, England
Email: sophia.bennett@example.com
Phone: 07876 543210

Personal Statement

Sophia Bennett is a seasoned Product Manager with a robust 30-year career in the UK banking industry. With a degree in Mathematics from a Russell Group university, she has excelled in leading product development and managing successful launches for top-tier banks. Sophia's expertise in strategic planning, market analysis, and customer satisfaction has consistently driven business growth and product innovation.

Key Skills Summary

  • Product Lifecycle Management
  • Market Research and Analysis
  • Strategic Product Planning
  • Cross-functional Team Collaboration
  • Customer Experience Enhancement
  • Data Analysis and Interpretation

Education History

University of York (Russell Group)

  • BSc Mathematics
  • Graduated: 1994

Work History

Product Manager | NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK | 2018 - Present
At NatWest Bank, Sophia led the creation and launch of new financial products, significantly boosting customer acquisition. Her role involved close collaboration with marketing and IT teams to ensure successful product integration and market alignment.

Product Manager | Santander UK
Manchester, UK | 2015 - 2018
Sophia managed a comprehensive portfolio of financial products, driving a 20% increase in revenue. She utilized market analysis to inform strategic planning and product development.

Product Manager | Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK | 2012 - 2015
Sophia's role at Nationwide Building Society involved overseeing the entire product lifecycle, from ideation to market launch. Her focus on customer feedback and market trends enabled the creation of products that met evolving customer needs.

Product Manager | Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK | 2009 - 2012
At Halifax Bank, Sophia directed product lifecycle management, achieving a notable increase in market share. Her efforts focused on customer feedback and market trends to refine product offerings.

Product Manager | Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK | 2006 - 2009
Sophia oversaw product development from ideation to launch, ensuring alignment with market needs. She engaged stakeholders to support successful product rollouts and improve customer satisfaction.

Product Manager | Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK | 2003 - 2006
Sophia managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. Her strategic initiatives led to significant business growth and customer retention.

Product Manager | Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK | 2000 - 2003
Sophia's role at Barclays involved leading product innovation and ensuring market fit. Her collaborative approach resulted in improved product features and user experience.

Various Roles in Product Management | Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK | 1994 - 2000
Sophia gained extensive experience in product management through various roles, building a solid foundation in banking operations and product development.

Qualifications

  • Certified Product Manager (CPM)
  • PRINCE2 Practitioner
  • Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)
  • Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
  • Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)
